package.name: ada
package.readme:
ada: an R package for stochastic boosting
Performs discrete, real, and gentle boost under both exponential and logistic loss on a given data set. The package ada provides a straightforward, well-documented, and broad boosting routine for classification, ideally suited for small to moderate-sized data sets. Please refer to the Url below for more information.
https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/ada/index.html
